resources.string: Table of BMI according age groups
19 to 24 age you should have 19 to 24 BMI
25 to 34 age you should have 20 to 25 BMI
35 to 44 age you should have 21 to 26 BMI
45 to 54 age you should have 22 to 27 BMI
55 to 64 age you should have 23 to 28 BMI
65 and elder age you should have 24 to 29
Too young, to be in table of age

"
 1. Enter your weight in kg.
 2. Enter your length in cm.
 3. Enter your age. 
 4. Click button CALCULATE. 
 5. You should see digits on top, this is your BMI. 
 6. Under the button CALCULATE, you should see a tick, what BMI is recommended in that ages. 
 7. For better view, under this tick, you should see visual bar. 
 8. Menu button SAVE saves your result in phone memory. 
 9. Menu button HISTORY reveals your result from phone's memory. 
 10.Menu button HISTORY CLEAR delete all information, previously saved, but app will ask you before 
 11.Menu button SHARE shares your result. Either current data, or saved data
 12.Menu button Sign Up - in work, wait for future versions 
 13.Menu button ? - this text ENJOY!!
